importFromXml

public java.util.List<?> importFromXml(java.lang.String xml,
                                       java.util.Collection<Setting.Type> types)
Description copied from interface: SettingsService
Import settings from the given xml string. The expected format is: 
 <cyclos-settings>
     <settings type="...">
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
     </settings;>
     <settings type="...">
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
         <setting name="...">
             value
         </setting>
     </settings;>
 </cyclos-settings>

Specified by:
importFromXml in interface SettingsService
types - type of settings to import
